extendedInfo.description: This mobile application is a companion app for Insperityâ¢ ExpensAbleÂ® Corporate. If you are an ExpensAble Office customer, please install the mobile application titled Insperity ExpensAble Office; this application is not designed to work with Insperity ExpensAble Office. ExpensAble Corporate is a convenient, money-saving, web-based, expense reporting tool designed for companies with more than 10 expense filers. A great time saver for the busy traveler who is expected to submit expenses, approve expense reports or both using ExpensAble Corporate. As an ExpensAble Corporate customer, you can use the mobile application to: Create individual expenses - Capture receipts with your deviceâs camera - Add expense details - Customize merchant and city lists - Convert foreign currencies using built-in, real-time currency converter - Autocomplete your location using location services - Send expenses and photo receipts to your personal ExpensAble Corporate âE-binâ Approve Expense Reports - Review high-level details - Drill in to view individual expenses within the report - Approve or reject the report- View receipt attachments - View policy warnings - Forward to another approver Expense card - View card status, balance, transaction history and pending transactions - Drill-in to view transaction details - Request funds - View request history - Review and approve/reject funds requests Use the mobile application, and you can snap photos of receipts right at the point of purchase and send them to ExpensAble Corporate. Once you log into ExpensAble Corporate, your mobile transactions are in the electronic bin or E-bin, ready to be added to your reports. You can even use the feature if you have no connectivity at the time. Expenses are simply saved in your unsent list. To use this mobile app, you will need the company ID, username and password used to sign-in to ExpensAble Corporate. For more information about ExpensAble Corporate and other automated expense management solutions for any size business, visit http://www.insperity.com/products/expense-management

reviews.title: This app is convenient and easy to use.
reviews.comment: I enjoy being able to track my expenses and receipts through out the day.  It truly helps with reimbursements and filling out my expense report.  I no longer spend an entire Sunday attaching receipts and writing down my expense.  I open the app, snap a picture, write some details and I\'m done.
reviews.author: Nathan M Jones

reviews.title: Work great except when your password expires
reviews.comment: App has to be uninstalled and reloaded when password expires.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Latest upgrade is a step in the wong direction
reviews.comment: Your updates keep getting worse. After last update my expense categories are blank and my merchant section is grayed out.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes a lot
reviews.comment: Crashes after taking pic....you need to fix this Samsung galaxy s3 Update!!!! Looks Like you fixed most everything....except when you put purpose it does not transfer over.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Can\'t login. Credentials work fine on desktop browser.  UPDATE: tried again with latest version 6/25/13. Still can\'t login. Still useless. Don\'t waste your time.
reviews.author: Devon Copley

reviews.title: Makes expenses easy
reviews.comment: Good features but camera crashes using droid charge.  How about option to let us choose picture already scanned?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not taking our company code
reviews.comment: We have a company code that is two characters.. The droid version states company must be 3 characters.
reviews.author: Robert Leiker

reviews.title: Crash prone
reviews.comment: Have to try to upload receipts 3 or 4 times and sometimes can never get it to work. Using Samsung Galaxy 3.
reviews.author: Patrick Stuver

reviews.title: Getting better still some issues.
reviews.comment: Offline capture is buggy at best. Cannot add guests to meals currently. Annoying that only web OR mobile can be logged in at any time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: UK user under duress
reviews.comment: Please amend things to be entered in \302\243\302\243\302\243\302\243\302\243 It mostly does its job, certainly easier than having to remember to do expenses on a Friday, but no mileage?! That\'s more than half my expensees that it won\'t cover!
reviews.author: Mark Crowther

reviews.title: Unstable
reviews.comment: Does not work on samsung galaxy
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Check password length/content
reviews.comment: This app crashed for me when trying to log in the first time.  I use secure/random passwords. First I shortened my password from 32 to 16 chars. Still crashed.  Then I made a password with only numbers and letters - Great Success
reviews.author: David Martinez

reviews.title: Very good product
reviews.comment: Could be better though. For example, adding an optional free text comment to an entry would help a lot.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Always crashes
reviews.comment: Not able to save photo without app crashing - Galaxy S3
reviews.author: Emily Colarusso

reviews.title: Still crashes!
reviews.comment: You guys are killing me. Who do you get to do your QA, chimpanzees?! Still crashes, and after that, refuses to upload pictures, and resets all the data when the picture is taken.  Do you even use your own app?!  On the other hand, you get what you pay for. It is free after all, but sheesh.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This was working great until  2/20 its not
reviews.comment: This was working OK even on my new Samsung Galaxy but as of 2/20/12 is has stopped working on my Samsung smart phone and my I-pad. Needs to get fixed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Use all the time...but
reviews.comment: This has worked great for me until today; it won\'t open. I have it on two phones and it won\'t open on either phone. Please fix. Also would love if I could enter millage from the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Tossing my receipts
reviews.comment: Snap photo of receipt, send it and throw away receipt! Thanks for adding approval but don\'t stop winning me back now expensable. Keep adding more
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fix please
reviews.comment: Frequent reinstalls to keep working.  Attached pictures are thumbnails when our accounting department opens reports.  Unviewable attachments prevent our group from using.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Force close on image capture
reviews.comment: Crashes on DROID x2 99% of the time.. Worthless.
reviews.author: A Google User
